description: Function 'fuzzy_search' is defined conditionally based on feature flag, but not available at runtime when flag is disabled
expected_fix: Either enable the feature flag ENABLE_ADVANCED_SEARCH=true, or add a fallback/check before calling fuzzy_search in search_engine.py
optimal_fix: In search_engine.py, modify the advanced_search method (around line 118) to check if fuzzy_search exists: 'if fuzzy and has_advanced_search(): return fuzzy_search(...) else: return self.basic_search(query)'
